Text: RESTRICTIONS SEALS OUTAGES FOR MAY THROUGH OCTOBER AM CCT TO ALL TENNESSEE CUSTOMERS RE RESTRICTIONS SEALS OUTAGES FOR MAY THROUGH OCTOBER This notice updates the RESTRICTION SEALS AND OUTAGES notice posted on March Projects that have been added or updated are preceded with followed by a description of the change Tennessee has planned the following activities between May and October that may result in restrictions seals or meter outages Some of these projects are in the planning stages and may be altered or postponed Tennessee will inform you of any material change at least days in advance ANOMALY INSPECTION BETWEEN MLV On May with possible extension to May nominations will not be accepted for meter Pearl River On May with possible extension to May may restrict and seal prorata Secondary services ITX IT AOT PAT Payback EDSERS Secondary to meters located downstream of MLV in Zone Transco Rivervale Tappan Knollwood White Plains Rye Nominations will not be allowed for meter Elizabeth Oakdale Sales RELOCATION OF MLV PROJECT Louisiana state highway expansion From May through may restrict and seal prorata Secondary services ITX IT AOT PAT Payback EDSERS Secondary from meters located upstream of Station including the Zone L pool meter excluding meters located on the west and southwest legs of the Blue Water System From May through nominations will not be accepted for meters Sevarg Glenmora Dehyd OXY Glenmora Dehyd Olympic Hickman James Laddie Hogan Glenmora South Glenmora Roy O Martin Elizabeth United Glenmora Elizabeth Oakdale Sales Installation of Pig Launchers and Receiver on the La Rosa Lateral From May through nominations will not be accepted for meters Mustang Island Dehyd Mustang Island Dehyd Red Fish Bay Dehyd Mustang Island Dehyd Stedman Island Dehyd Ingleside Dyhyd Mustang Island Mustang Dehyd Nugget Ingleside Dehyd Larosa Field Dehyd Redfish Bay Transport Mustang Island Ingleside Sales Alkali Plant Sales Ingleside Sales Ingleside Big Transport Reynolds DATE CHANGES METER ADDED TO JULY TO OUTAGE Installation of Pig Launchers and Receiver downstream of MLV From May through nominations will not be accepted for meters Dracut MN Dracut Colonial Dracut MN From June through nominations will not be accepted for meter Concord From June through nominations will not be accepted for meter Lawrence From July through nominations will not be accepted for meters Gloucester Wenham Essex W Peabody From July through nominations will not be accepted for meters Reading Wilmington Peabody Power Light Camp Curtis From August through nominations will not be accepted for meters Beverly Salem Peabody Power Light Concord Lateral Replacement Project Time to time from May through October may restrict and seal prorata Secondary services ITX IT AOT PAT Payback EDSERS Secondary to meters located on the Concord Lateral NEW PROJECT Replace MLV From June through nominations will not be accepted for meters Honeoye Honeoye Hopewell NEW PROJECT Installation of Pig Launcher and Receiver From July through nominations will not be accepted for meter Agawam Line MLV and Pig Launcher and Receiver Project For a to week period in September may restrict and seal Secondary services ITX IT AOT PAT Payback EDSERS Secondary from meters located upstream of Station on the Line including the Zone L pool meter and the Zone Leg pool meter excluding meters located on the west and southwest legs of the Blue Water System If you have any questions please contact your Account Representative or Volume Analyst Craig Harris Manager Operations Control This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender

UPDATE OUTAGES FOR MAY AM CCT TO ALL TENNESSEE CUSTOMERS RE UPDATE OUTAGES FOR MAY This notice announces a new project schedule to begin May and provides updated information on the MLV project scheduled to occur in May For information on all other projects scheduled to occur between May and October please see the UPDATE RESTRICTION SEALS AND OUTAGES notice posted on April New Customer TieIn Dates predicated on weather and diver availability VERMILION OUTAGE From May through the A Lateral will be taken out of service to perform a customer tiein During the outage nominations will not be accepted at meters VM and VM Outage Dates Changed to May through RELOCATION OF MLV Louisiana state highway expansion From May through may restrict and seal prorata Secondary services ITX IT AOT PAT Payback EDSERS Secondary from meters located upstream of Station including the Zone L pool meter excluding meters located on the west and southwest legs of the Blue Water System From May through nominations will not be accepted for meters Sevarg Glenmora Dehyd OXY Glenmora Dehyd Olympic Hickman James Laddie Hogan Glenmora South Glenmora Roy O Martin Elizabeth United Glenmora Elizabeth Oakdale Sales From May through may restrict and seal of Secondary receipts ITX IT AOT PAT Payback EDSERS Secondary from meters located upstream of Station including the L pool meter and excluding meters located on the west and southwest legs of the Blue Water System If you have any questions please contact your Account Representative or Volume Analyst Craig Harris Manager Operations Control This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender
